Wakari Senju.name: Energy Infusion – Full Body
Wakari Senju.description: Channels raw energy into any part of his body for explosive combat power.

Wakari Senju.name: Purple Surge – Inner Focus
Wakari Senju.description: Enters a heightened energetic state where his aura amplifies all senses despite blindness.

Wakari Senju.name: Signature Form – Echo of the Senju
Wakari Senju.description: A transformation channeling ancestral martial spirits through his aura and strikes.

Wakari Senju.name: Echo Sense
Wakari Senju.description: Using vibration and energetic frequency, Wakari 'sees' the world without sight.

Wakari Senju.name: Rising Strike – Crescent Palm
Wakari Senju.description: A spiritual martial technique passed down from Cartier Karo’s lineage, infused with kinetic Chi.

Asa Knight.name: Healing Light Pulse
Asa Knight.description: Generates restorative light that can mend severe wounds or revive allies from near-death.

Asa Knight.name: Energetic Surge – Bloom of Resilience
Asa Knight.description: Asa’s aura flares with pink flower petals and healing waves, enhancing her allies' stamina and focus.

Asa Knight.name: Spirit Infusion – Lotus Heart
Asa Knight.description: A form where she bonds with an ancient spirit of light, boosting speed, light affinity, and resistance to corruption.

Asa Knight.name: Radiant Bloom Barrier
Asa Knight.description: Summons a radiant dome of light infused with pink petals that blocks incoming energy attacks and gradually heals all inside.

Asa Knight.name: Essence Petal Rain
Asa Knight.description: Channels emotional energy into falling ethereal petals that purify curses, remove ailments, and boost the energy flow of all allies they touch.

Miguel Senju.name: Dual Surge Manifestation
Miguel Senju.description: Blue and purple energy wielded in both hands, enhancing tactical offense.

Miguel Senju.name: Momentum Reversal
Miguel Senju.description: Shifts kinetic force of attacks mid-combat.

Miguel Senju.name: Energetic Surge
Miguel Senju.description: Early-stage form with unique aura balance.

Miguel Senju.name: Chi Thread Redirection
Miguel Senju.description: Manipulates residual energy trails to weave chi threads mid-air.

Miguel Senju.name: Split Nexus Pulse
Miguel Senju.description: Briefly separates the blue and purple energies into autonomous extensions of Miguel’s will.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Lightning Dash Assault
Kael Ranmaru.description: Kael vanishes in a blink and unleashes a flurry of high-speed charged strikes.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Energetic Surge – Flash Overdrive
Kael Ranmaru.description: In this form, Kael’s hair glows yellow and his body crackles with lightning, doubling his speed and reflexes.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Signature Move – Thunder Collapse
Kael Ranmaru.description: Channels lightning into the ground to erupt in a dome-shaped blast that paralyzes and scorches opponents.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Volt Mirage
Kael Ranmaru.description: Kael creates afterimages made of pure lightning that move independently for a few seconds. These illusions can detonate on contact or act as feints in battle.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Plasma Vein Surge
Kael Ranmaru.description: Temporarily converts Kael’s blood into hyper-conductive plasma, causing his strikes to ignore physical resistance and leaving streaks of residual lightning that chain between targets.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Shadow Slip
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: Vanishes into surfaces and reappears unpredictably.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Tidal Slice
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: Channeling water blades into martial strikes.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Surge Form – Abyssal Stalker
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: Full Murkfolk energy unleash, eyes glow gold.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Blackwater Shroud
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: A dense mist infused with shadow and aquatic energy blankets the field.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Echo Fang Torrent
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: Thalon unleashes multiple delayed shadow-water slashes from different angles that converge after a delay.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Void Infusion
Sahil the Warlock.description: Forbidden Dark Energy channeled through a cursed gauntlet that consumes life force.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Shadowflame Spiral
Sahil the Warlock.description: Combines dark flame and shadow energy into an explosive barrage.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Surge Form – Abysscaller
Sahil the Warlock.description: Enhanced mode with flaring horn and dark mist rising from his corrupted arm.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Null Brand Detonation
Sahil the Warlock.description: Marks a target with a sigil of decay; detonates into a vortex of anti-energy that erases buffs and seals abilities.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Dread Crown Awakening
Sahil the Warlock.description: Calls upon the latent power within his cursed horn for an unstable, godlike energy boost.

Nyxis.name: Nuclear Shadow Daggers
Nyxis.description: Twin energy blades that phase through armor and disrupt life energy.

Nyxis.name: Assassin’s Echo
Nyxis.description: Mimics opponent’s last move within 1 second of witnessing it.

Nyxis.name: Silent Erasure
Nyxis.description: Becomes undetectable by sight, sound, or energy sensors for a short burst.

Nyxis.name: Radiocide Pulse
Nyxis.description: Unleashes a silent nuclear shockwave that fries tech and scorches the environment in a crescent arc.

Nyxis.name: Oblivion Step
Nyxis.description: A teleportation-like dash through shadow and radiation, degrading space for energy users that follow.

Joann Senju.name: Spirit Bloom Barrier
Joann Senju.description: Joann summons a radiant shield of ethereal light energy, enveloping allies in a protective dome that deflects incoming attacks and soothes wounds with gentle spiritual resonance, a hallmark of her role as the Senju matriarch.

Joann Senju.name: Healing Flow Technique
Joann Senju.description: Channels a serene stream of light energy through her hands, rapidly mending injuries and restoring vitality to allies. This technique, rooted in her mastery of emotional energy, fosters hope and resilience in battle.

Joann Senju.name: Ancestral Memory Pulse
Joann Senju.description: Emits a vibrant pulse of ethereal energy, invoking ancestral Senju spirits to inspire allies. The pulse enhances focus and morale, connecting fighters to the wisdom and strength of their lineage.

Joann Senju.name: Serenity Field
Joann Senju.description: Creates a calming field of light energy that radiates peace, reducing enemy hostility and bolstering ally defenses. Joann’s serene aura pacifies chaotic energies, making it a vital support technique.

Joann Senju.name: Ethereal Tide Call
Joann Senju.description: Summons a surging tide of ethereal energy that disrupts enemy formations. This spiritual wave, infused with light, cleanses negative effects and empowers allies with renewed vigor in combat.

Cartier Karo.name: Crimson Impact Drive
Cartier Karo.description: Unleashes a devastating strike infused with kinetic chi, channeling the Senju-Karo lineage’s martial prowess. The crimson energy surge delivers bone-shattering force, capable of breaking through even the toughest defenses.

Cartier Karo.name: Bonequake Step
Cartier Karo.description: Stomps the ground with immense force, triggering seismic tremors infused with chi energy. This technique, passed down through generations, destabilizes enemies and creates openings for Cartier’s legendary martial attacks.

Cartier Karo.name: Karo Fist Lineage Break
Cartier Karo.description: Delivers a powerful punch imbued with ancestral chi, shattering enemy barriers. The technique embodies the Karo family’s martial tradition, combining raw strength with spiritual energy to overwhelm foes.

Cartier Karo.name: Pressure Pulse Cannon
Cartier Karo.description: Fires a concentrated blast of kinetic energy, propelled by Cartier’s mastery of chi. The high-pressure pulse pierces defenses, delivering explosive impact to single targets or small groups.

Cartier Karo.name: Guardian's Warcry
Cartier Karo.description: Emits a commanding shout infused with chi, rallying allies and intimidating enemies. This ancestral technique boosts team morale and temporarily enhances physical strength, reflecting Cartier’s role as a protector.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Hollow Spiral Flame
Deaengelo Senju.description: Spins a vortex of dark flames, fueled by his obsession with destructive power. This chaotic energy engulfs enemies in a spiraling inferno, burning through defenses and leaving a trail of corrosive ash.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Dark Chi Reversal
Deaengelo Senju.description: Redirects enemy energy with dark chi, turning their attacks against them. Deaengelo’s mastery of forbidden energies allows him to manipulate and corrupt incoming forces, destabilizing opponents in combat.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Vengeful Surge
Deaengelo Senju.description: Unleashes a surge of dark energy, amplifying his destructive capabilities. This vengeful burst, driven by Deaengelo’s inner rage, enhances his attacks and overwhelms foes with raw, chaotic power.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Shadowbrand Clutch
Deaengelo Senju.description: Traps enemies in a shadowy grasp of dark energy, immobilizing them. Deaengelo’s technique brands foes with a corrosive sigil, draining their strength while bolstering his own destructive force.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Nexus Breach Infusion
Deaengelo Senju.description: Infuses attacks with chaotic dark energy, breaching the Nexus’s stability. Deaengelo’s forbidden technique destabilizes energy fields, amplifying his strikes with unpredictable, devastating power.

Aman Senju.name: Whisperwind Slash
Aman Senju.description: Delivers a swift, precise slash infused with wind and ethereal energy. Aman’s calm precision slices through defenses, channeling natural energy to disrupt enemy formations with graceful, flowing strikes.

Aman Senju.name: Nature Pulse Harmonization
Aman Senju.description: Emits a soothing pulse of natural energy, harmonizing allies with the environment. Aman’s technique restores stamina and enhances focus, drawing strength from the earth to support his team.

Aman Senju.name: Chi Feedback Loop
Aman Senju.description: Creates a cyclical flow of chi energy, amplifying ally abilities. Aman’s technique redirects ambient energy to boost team performance, reflecting his role as a composed support fighter.

Aman Senju.name: Ethereal Lull
Aman Senju.description: Projects an ethereal aura that calms enemies and reduces aggression. Aman’s light energy technique soothes chaotic battlefields, creating openings for strategic maneuvers and ally recovery.

Aman Senju.name: Senju Root Technique
Aman Senju.description: Channels natural energy through roots, anchoring allies and disrupting foes. Aman’s technique strengthens defenses and grounds energy flows, embodying the Senju legacy of balance and resilience.

Rina Nakamura.name: Liquid Construct Blade
Rina Nakamura.description: Forms a razor-sharp blade of water energy, slicing through defenses. Rina’s mastery of water constructs delivers precise, fluid strikes, cutting enemies with the relentless force of a rushing current.

Rina Nakamura.name: Aqua Barrier Bloom
Rina Nakamura.description: Summons a blooming shield of water energy, deflecting attacks. Rina’s defensive construct absorbs impacts and releases a soothing mist, protecting allies while maintaining her fluid combat style.

Rina Nakamura.name: Flow Pulse Cage
Rina Nakamura.description: Traps enemies in a pulsating cage of water energy, restricting movement. Rina’s technique creates a swirling vortex that confines foes, allowing allies to strike with tactical precision.

Rina Nakamura.name: Rippling Deflect
Rina Nakamura.description: Generates a rippling water energy barrier that redirects enemy attacks. Rina’s fluid defense reflects energy assaults, using the momentum of water to protect allies and disrupt opponents.

Rina Nakamura.name: Rising Wave Formation
Rina Nakamura.description: Unleashes a surging wave of water energy, overwhelming enemy lines. Rina’s technique floods the battlefield with powerful currents, pushing back foes and supporting allies with dynamic force.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Ethereal Projection
Kaito Tanaka.description: Projects an ethereal form of wind energy, confusing enemies. Kaito’s tactical technique creates a ghostly duplicate that distracts foes, allowing rapid repositioning and strategic strikes in combat.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Gale Burst Dash
Kaito Tanaka.description: Dashes forward with a burst of wind energy, enhancing speed. Kaito’s rapid movement creates a gale-force shockwave, knocking back enemies and setting up devastating follow-up attacks.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Wind Shield Layer
Kaito Tanaka.description: Forms a layered shield of wind energy, deflecting projectiles. Kaito’s defensive technique swirls air currents around allies, protecting them from attacks while maintaining his mobility.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Cyclone Deflect Pulse
Kaito Tanaka.description: Emits a pulsating cyclone of wind energy, redirecting assaults. Kaito’s technique creates a spinning vortex that deflects enemy attacks and disrupts their positioning on the battlefield.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Updraft Combo Flurry
Kaito Tanaka.description: Unleashes a flurry of wind-infused strikes, propelled by updrafts. Kaito’s rapid combo overwhelms enemies with relentless attacks, using his wind mastery to dominate aerial combat.

Haku Sharma.name: Ember Palm Strike
Haku Sharma.description: Delivers a fiery palm strike infused with kinetic fire energy. Haku’s tribal technique scorches enemies with explosive force, embodying his brawler spirit in devastating close-combat attacks.

Haku Sharma.name: Kinetic Flame Barrage
Haku Sharma.description: Unleashes a barrage of kinetic fire energy, overwhelming foes. Haku’s relentless assault rains fiery blows, combining raw power with tribal ferocity to incinerate enemy defenses.

Haku Sharma.name: Blazing Counter
Haku Sharma.description: Counters attacks with a sudden burst of fire energy. Haku’s technique turns enemy strikes into opportunities, enveloping assailants in flames while maintaining his aggressive combat stance.

Haku Sharma.name: Fire Spiral Kick
Haku Sharma.description: Spins into a fiery kick, propelled by kinetic fire energy. Haku’s tribal technique delivers a spiraling blaze, striking multiple enemies with explosive force and dynamic momentum.

Haku Sharma.name: Pressure Chain Break
Haku Sharma.description: Breaks enemy formations with a chain of fiery energy bursts. Haku’s technique unleashes relentless pressure, disrupting foes with kinetic flames and asserting his dominance in battle.

Dawn Blakes.name: Thunderclash Burst
Dawn Blakes.description: Unleashes a thunderous burst of lightning and fire energy. Dawn’s nexus-level power electrifies and incinerates foes, creating a devastating explosion that showcases her unmatched elemental prowess.

Dawn Blakes.name: Ember Lance Drive
Dawn Blakes.description: Thrusts a lance of fire energy, charged with lightning. Dawn’s technique pierces defenses with searing precision, combining fiery intensity and electric force to overwhelm her opponents.

Dawn Blakes.name: Surge Ignition Overload
Dawn Blakes.description: Triggers an overload of fire and lightning energy, devastating enemies. Dawn’s surge creates a chaotic blast, amplifying her nexus-level power to dominate the battlefield with elemental fury.

Dawn Blakes.name: Sparkblade Reversal
Dawn Blakes.description: Counters with a spark-infused blade of fire energy. Dawn’s technique redirects enemy attacks, slashing with electrified flames to turn the tide of battle in her favor.

Dawn Blakes.name: Phoenix Arc Discharge
Dawn Blakes.description: Releases an arc of phoenix-like fire and lightning energy. Dawn’s technique engulfs enemies in a radiant discharge, reviving her resolve while scorching foes with elemental power.
